Reviews.Title: List of items included
Reviews.Author: Neil
Reviews.Content: Just received this combo package.  There are plenty of reviews on Amazon and other photo websites about the camera, but I just wanted to list the items that came with this particular combo package.Includes:1)  Sony RX100M2 camera (obviously)2)  Sony 64GB Class 10 SDXC UHS-I memory card3)  High speed SD/SDHC/Micro SD USB card reader/writer4)  Package of 3 screen protectors5)  Tabletop tripod6)  Lens and screen cleaning kit7)  Extra battery8)  Carrying case9)  Micro HDMI to HDMI cable10) Travel charger with European adapter plug and cigarette lighter plug (not shown in picture)

Reviews.Title: Best Pocket Camera Ever
Reviews.Author: Hodge Jones "Hodge"
Reviews.Content: The low-light abilities of this camera are phenomenal, whether for stills or movies.  Also captures wildlife startlingly well.  The automatic features are well thought out and well executed.

Reviews.Title: great for the amateur or professional
Reviews.Author: Jennifer Heizer
Reviews.Content: Purchased for our honeymoon.  So easy to use as a point and shoot. The added features make this camera fun to experiment with on all the different shooting modes.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for travel with the family.
Reviews.Author: Marc Nicosia
Reviews.Content: This camera has been great. I am still learning all the different features but with two kids ages 1 and 3 speed and ability to snap those action shots has been outstanding. Low light performance is another key we wanted and this camera has not disappointed. I only wish there was a classic viewfinder for those full sun days. We took it to Disney World with us and with the included carrying case through my belt loop it was very easy to carry around and fast to access. Much better than lugging my SLR.

Reviews.Title: Best Point & Shoot
Reviews.Author: Michael Hansen
Reviews.Content: Great Camera with remarkable lens. The sensor size provides beautiful pictures under low light conditions. The neatest is the wifi connectivity. NO MORE CABLES. Yea.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: markluck
Reviews.Content: This is a great option for someone who doesn't want the bulk of a dslr. Taking photos with it is fun and they are outstanding in low light as well as bright light. Controls very intuitive.

Reviews.Title: an ultimate point and shoot camera.
Reviews.Author: John Fenstermaker
Reviews.Content: That is, until Sony came out with a full frame that is about the same size.  And much more expensive.

Reviews.Title: phenomenal camera and kit
Reviews.Author: D. Carneiro
Reviews.Content: Spectacular.  This is a very good camera, and above expectations.  I am a Pro photographer and own several DSLRs and medium format cameras, but this one amazes me every single time. The price is fair and the shipping was phenomenal.  Thumbs up!  Cheers.
